headline: Bug in Amazon scams me into buying more units than I asked for
description:
For the past few weeks, whenever I try to buy 1 of something on Amazon with the "buy now" button, an order for between 2 and 5 often ends up being created.

I figure if this is affecting me, there must be a large subgroup of users who are having orders stuffed for product they don't want.

I've tried to contact support, but no one cares / believes me.

Video of the bug in action:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nq53MlnqSnU
headline_zh-Hans: 亚马逊的漏洞骗我买了比我要求的更多的单位
headline_zh-Hant: 亞馬遜的漏洞騙我買了比我要求的更多的單位
description_zh-Hans:

我想如果这影响到我，一定有一大批用户被塞进他们不想要的产品的订单。

我曾试图联系支持，但没有人关心/相信我。

该错误的操作视频：

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Nq53MlnqSnU
